execution_plan.description: Find orders with the earliest placement date or more than one item; return order id, date placed, and item count.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.order_id AS s1__order_id, o.date_order_placed AS s1__date_order_placed, COUNT(oi.order_item_id) AS s1__item_count FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY o.order_id, o.date_order_placed HAVING o.date_order_placed = (SELECT MIN(date_order_placed) FROM Orders) OR COUNT(oi.order_item_id) > 1;
